cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakana

sentence.kanji: 肉と魚とどちらが好きですか。
sentence.romaji: niku to sakana to dochira ga suki desu ka
sentence.english: Which do you prefer, meat or fish?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hi

sentence.kanji: 火を消して。
sentence.romaji: hi wo keshite
sentence.english: Put the fire out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tera

sentence.kanji: あそこに古いお寺があります。
sentence.romaji: asoko ni furui otera ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's an old temple there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keshigomu

sentence.kanji: 消しゴムを貸して下さい。
sentence.romaji: keshigomu wo kashite kudasai
sentence.english: Please lend me your eraser.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tomeru

sentence.kanji: 友達をうちに泊めてあげました。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi wo uchi ni tomete agemashita
sentence.english: I put my friend up at my house.

cards.english: wish, ask a favor, apply for
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's negau

sentence.kanji: 彼が元気になるよう願っています。
sentence.romaji: kare ga genki ni naru you negate imasu
sentence.english: We're praying that he gets well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oyogu

sentence.kanji: 彼女はダイエットのために泳いでいる。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha daieto no tame ni oyoide iru
sentence.english: She swims to lose weight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koori

sentence.kanji: グラスに氷を入れてください。
sentence.romaji: gurasu ni koori wo irete kudasai
sentence.english: Please put some ice in my glass.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suiei

sentence.kanji: 母は健康のために水泳をしている。
sentence.romaji: haha ha kenkou no tame ni suiei wo shite iru
sentence.english: My mother swims for her health.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kieru

sentence.kanji: 突然、電気が消えた。
sentence.romaji: totsuzen denki ga kieta
sentence.english: Suddenly the electricity went out.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatake

sentence.kanji: 母は畑仕事が好きだ。
sentence.romaji: haha ha hatake shigoto ga suki da
sentence.english: My mother likes working in the field.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hai

sentence.kanji: 火事ですべて灰になった。
sentence.romaji: kaji de subete hai ni nata
sentence.english: Everything turned to ashes in the fire.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gesui

sentence.kanji: その道は今、下水の工事をしているよ。
sentence.romaji: sono michi ha ima gesui no kouji wo shite iru yo
sentence.english: The street is now under construction for drainage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouka

sentence.kanji: 火事は無事消火されました。
sentence.romaji: kaji ha buji shouka saremashita
sentence.english: The fire was safely extinguished.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ten

sentence.kanji: その点は心配ありません。
sentence.romaji: sono ten ha shinpai arimasen
sentence.english: There's nothing to worry about regarding that.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichiji

sentence.kanji: お店は一時休業になったんだ。
sentence.romaji: omise ha ichiji kyuugyou ni nata n da
sentence.english: The store was temporarily closed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nichiji

sentence.kanji: 試写会の日時を教えてください。
sentence.romaji: shishakai no nichiji wo oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me the date of the sneak preview.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suiden

sentence.kanji: 窓の外に水田が広がっていたよ。
sentence.romaji: mado no soto ni suiden ga hirogate ita yo
sentence.english: A sweep of rice field appeared outside the window.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gensoku

sentence.kanji: 原則としてキャンセルできません。
sentence.romaji: gensoku to shite kyanseru dekimasen
sentence.english: As a general rule, cancellations can't be accepted.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hara

sentence.kanji: クローバーの原でピクニックをしたよ。
sentence.romaji: kuro-ba- no hara de pikuniku wo shita yo
sentence.english: We had a picnic in a clover field.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's negai

sentence.kanji: 世界の平和が私たちの願いです。
sentence.romaji: sekai no heiwa ga watashi tachi no negai desu
sentence.english: Our wish is for world peace.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoukaki

sentence.kanji: 消火器を交換しました。
sentence.romaji: shoukaki wo koukan shimashita
sentence.english: The fire extinguisher was replaced.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mizuumi

sentence.kanji: 湖でスケートをした。
sentence.romaji: mizuumi de suke-to wo shita
sentence.english: We went skating on the lake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ogawa

sentence.kanji: 小川がさらさら流れています。
sentence.romaji: ogawa ga sarasara nagarete imasu
sentence.english: The stream flows smoothly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hakaru

sentence.kanji: このドアの高さを測ってください。
sentence.romaji: kono doa no takasa wo hakate kudasai
sentence.english: Please measure the height of this door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakou

sentence.kanji: この川の河口は太平洋に注いでいます。
sentence.romaji: kono kawa no kakou ha taiheiyou ni sosoide imasu
sentence.english: The mouth of this river flows into the Pacific Ocean.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jun

sentence.kanji: あいうえお順に並べて下さい。
sentence.romaji: aiueo jun ni narabete kudasai
sentence.english: Please line up in order of the Japanese syllabary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuu

sentence.kanji: 来月、隣の州に引っ越します。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu tonari no shuu ni hikoshimasu
sentence.english: I will move to the neighboring state next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoumei

sentence.kanji: もっと照明を明るくしてください。
sentence.romaji: moto shoumei wo akaruku shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn up the lighting more.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teru

sentence.kanji: 日差しが強く照りつけますね。
sentence.romaji: hizashi ga tsuyoku teritsukemasu ne
sentence.english: The sun is shining strongly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oomizu

sentence.kanji: その年、この地域では大水がありました。
sentence.romaji: sono toshi kono chiiki de ha oomizu ga arimashita
sentence.english: In that year there was a flood in this area.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's terasu

sentence.kanji: 月が庭を照らしている。
sentence.romaji: tsuki ga niwa wo terashite iru
sentence.english: The moon is shining on the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suichuu

sentence.kanji: このカメラなら水中の写真が撮れますね。
sentence.romaji: kono kamera nara suichuu no shashin ga toremasu ne
sentence.english: With this camera you can take underwater photographs .

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kasai

sentence.kanji: 火災の原因は放火だそうです。
sentence.romaji: kasai no genin ha houka da sou desu
sentence.english: I hear that the cause of the fire was arson.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oki

sentence.kanji: 沖に小島が見えます。
sentence.romaji: oki ni kojima ga miemasu
sentence.english: A small island can be seen off the shore.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's izumi

sentence.kanji: 森の中にきれいな泉があるの。
sentence.romaji: mori no naka ni kirei na izumi ga aru no
sentence.english: There is a beautiful spring in the forest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haku

sentence.kanji: 彼は乱暴な言葉を吐いたぞ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ranbou na kotoba wo haita zo
sentence.english: He hollered some rough words.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tahata

sentence.kanji: この村には田畑がたくさんあります。
sentence.romaji: kono mura ni ha tahata ga takusan arimasu
sentence.english: There are a lot of fields in this village.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's honoo

sentence.kanji: ろうそくの炎が部屋を照らしたんだ。
sentence.romaji: rousoku no honoo ga heya wo terashita n da
sentence.english: The candle's flame lit the room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuchi

sentence.kanji: 土を掘って木を植えました。
sentence.romaji: tsuchi wo hote ki wo uemashita
sentence.english: I dug up the soil and planted a tree.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's junjunni

sentence.kanji: 子供たちは順々にお菓子を受け取ったよ。
sentence.romaji: kodomotachi ha junjunni okashi wo uketota yo
sentence.english: Children received snacks one at a time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuu

sentence.kanji: 手紙に封をしたよ。
sentence.romaji: tegami ni fuu wo shita yo
sentence.english: I sealed the letter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yasui

sentence.kanji: この服はとても安かった。
sentence.romaji: kono fuku ha totemo yasukata
sentence.english: These clothes were very cheap.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's onaji

sentence.kanji: 彼の日本語のレベルは私と同じ位だ。
sentence.romaji: kare no nihongo no reberu ha watashi to onaji kurai da
sentence.english: His Japanese level is about the same as mine.

cards.english: the other side, the other party, opponent
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukou

sentence.kanji: 友達は向こうにいます。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi ha mukou ni imasu
sentence.english: My friend is over there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muku

sentence.kanji: こっちを向いてください。
sentence.romaji: kochi wo muite kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn this way.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ji

sentence.kanji: もっと大きく字を書いてください。
sentence.romaji: moto ookiku ji wo kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write the letters larger.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mukau

sentence.kanji: 今、会社に向かっています。
sentence.romaji: ima kaisha ni mukate imasu
sentence.english: I'm heading for the office right now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuro

sentence.kanji: 黒のボールペンはありますか。
sentence.romaji: kuro no bo-rupen ha arimasu ka
sentence.english: Do you have a black pen?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's myouji

sentence.kanji: あなたの名字は何ですか。
sentence.romaji: anata no myouji ha nan desu ka
sentence.english: What's your surname?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ro-maji

sentence.kanji: ローマ字で名前を書いてください。
sentence.romaji: ro-maji de namae wo kaite kudasai
sentence.english: Please write your name using Roman letters.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's makuro

sentence.kanji: インクで手が真っ黒になった
sentence.romaji: inku de te ga makuro ni nata
sentence.english: My hands got all black with ink.
